features.featureTitle: Update the Admin Lottery Management page (`frontend/src/pages/admin/LotteryManagement.tsx`) to change the inline validation for the 'Winner Payout %' field: allow values from 1 to 90 (not 1 to 70). Update the helper text label from 'System retains (100 - this value)% as profit. Max 70%' to 'System retains (100 - this value)% as profit. Max 90%'. Show an inline validation error only if `winnerPayoutPercent > 90` (not > 70). Update the calculated summary label 'System Profit' to reflect the correct retained percentage based on the entered value.
